Davie.Sheridan Street station: Sheridan Street is a Tri-Rail commuter rail station in Hollywood, Florida. The station is located near the intersection of Sheridan Street (SR 822) and North 29th Avenue, just west of Interstate 95 at Exit 21. The station opened to service March 15, 1996, and despite the appearance of the station in the infobox, it is not a rebuilt former Seaboard Air Line Railroad depot.
